channel.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
channel.description:
What are you most exited about seeing in the feed? Pick your 3 favorites and add new suggestions below!
[poll type=multiple min=1 max=3] * Featured tracks (but only if they have demo projects) * Featured tracks (but it's fine without demo projects) * Featured producers * Tutorial videos * Projects with loops that you can use in your tracks * Auxy announcements * Beat the Clock challenges * Other (add suggestions below) [/poll]

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Any chance, almost three months later, that we’ll see a return of the BTC’s to the app feed? Considering it’s 64% of the vote.

spoiler

item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
The “demos” on the featured tracks are actually what really helped me to learn different genres of music. In the beginning, I wanted to learn how to make a certain sound in that one song,but I couldn’t figure it out. It was in looking at these demo projects that I learned to make good chords, or wubs, or which sound packs I wanted to invest in.

Overall, the demo projects are really important to get beginners learning faster.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Shivam:

but there can be option what to get notified

You can actually opt-in to notifications for the ‘feature request’ threads here.
Seems a little redundant to put it in the Auxy app too.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Speaking as someone who very rarely looks at the Feed (I hadn’t looked in there since the AP-007 release and I’d never looked at How To until today)…

I’m curious to know what the plan ultimately is for the Feed.

Is the intention to make it something people spend more time viewing/browsing – e.g. a content destination?
…or still keep it light and brief (1 or 2 posts per week), but just make the content more centred on what users want to see?

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
It’s nice to learn new tricks by looking at demo projects, but BTC and Auxy announcements are more important. I’d like some sort of soundpack teaser maybe a few days before they come out as well.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I wasn’t saying it was against people’s best interest. I don’t think you’re going against people’s best interest either. I am sorry if I was coming off that way.

It’s more of a personal thing that things I feel are important aren’t a priority and, to be quite fair, aren’t really as much of a priority as other things, such as full automation on the new drum settings, tempo automation, different time signatures, etc.

I really wasn’t intending it to be something negative.

Auxy:

charging for the app

I’ve answered my personal opinions on this before. I fully support the direction the app is taking. I still feel like there’s something lost with the direction the app is going, but I never would believe it’s against the best interest of those who use this app. And I apologize that it appeared that way. If I wanted the app for free, I wouldn’t have purchased it for 5$ when it first released on the app store so long ago c:

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
I don’t appreciate how you always seem to assume that we’re doing things against people’s best interest, whether it’s related to featuring tracks, building new features, charging for the app, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Perhaps having a vote with these tens of thousands of people in order to decide what sort of features they want most from the app would help push the app forward.

Not suggesting new things, but voting on a set number of possible features they want prioritized. I think that’d be nice to see, as some things that have been requested for a long time could finally become a priority.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you like most in the Auxy Feed?
